## Runtime.setHideGround() method

In point clouds wher the points are classified as `Ground`<!-- -->, hide the ground level points - Default: `false`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setHideGround(boolean: any): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  boolean | any |  |

**Returns:**

void
